title: (x) Art Nouveau "Robin's" - Roberta {Mark S, Mike Y}
content: Looks to me like a badly redrawn version of [Roberta](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142209/http:/www.urw.de/cgi-bin1/dalcgi/english/schnellsuche.htd?searchchar=roberta&image.x=0&image.y=0). (The URW page says it was designed in 2003, but I'm sure that refers to the digital version. I found it first in an old phototype specimen book.)
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: The font is called Roberta (Solotype Catalog p.45). Harold Lohner of [Harold's Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142209/http:/members.aol.com/fontner/frontpage.html) has a version of this Art Nouveau style (much older than the 70's) under his Revivals category.
